name: EMODnet Physics Data Catalog
description: Comprehensive entry point to global ocean physical observations, aggregating and federating datasets from key European and international oceanographic repositories and marine infrastructures. Offers in-situ ocean physics data (temperature, salinity, currents, sea level, waves, etc.) with metadata, downloadable in multiple formats (netCDF, CSV, TXT).
owner_name: EMODnet Physics (administered under European Commission framework)
